metadata.title: CVE-2016-8704 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - high
metadata.description:
An integer overflow in the process_bin_append_prepend function inMemcached, which is responsible for processing multiple commands ofMemcached binary protocol, can be abused to cause heap overflow and lead toremote code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-8704` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

memcached - 1.4.14-0ubuntu9.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: memcached package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.14-0ubuntu9.1').
